00068 BOOLEAN LoadTGAFileToImage( HIMAGE hImage, UINT16 fContents )
00069 {
00070       HWFILE      hFile;
00071       UINT8       uiImgID, uiColMap, uiType;
00072       UINT32      uiBytesRead;
00073       BOOLEAN fReturnVal = FALSE;
00074 
00075       Assert( hImage != NULL );
00076 
00077       CHECKF( FileExists( hImage->ImageFile ) );
00078 
00079       hFile = FileOpen( hImage->ImageFile, FILE_ACCESS_READ, FALSE );
00080       CHECKF( hFile );
00081 
00082       if ( !FileRead( hFile, &uiImgID, sizeof(UINT8), &uiBytesRead ) )
00083             goto end;
00084       if ( !FileRead( hFile, &uiColMap, sizeof(UINT8), &uiBytesRead ) )
00085             goto end;
00086       if ( !FileRead( hFile, &uiType, sizeof(UINT8), &uiBytesRead ) )
00087             goto end;
00088 
00089       switch( uiType )
00090       {
00091       case 1:
00092             fReturnVal = ReadUncompColMapImage( hImage, hFile, uiImgID, uiColMap, fContents );
00093             break;
00094       case 2:
00095             fReturnVal = ReadUncompRGBImage( hImage, hFile, uiImgID, uiColMap, fContents );
00096             break;
00097       case 9:
00098             fReturnVal = ReadRLEColMapImage( hImage, hFile, uiImgID, uiColMap, fContents );
00099             break;
00100       case 10:
00101             fReturnVal = ReadRLERGBImage( hImage, hFile, uiImgID, uiColMap, fContents );
00102             break;
00103       default:
00104             break;
00105       }
00106 
00107   // Set remaining values
00108 
00109 end:
00110       FileClose( hFile );
00111       return( fReturnVal );
00112 }

00135 // ReadUncompRGBImage
00136 //
00137 //

00140 // Return Value :
00141 // Modification history :

00143 //          20nov96:HJH       -> creation

00147 BOOLEAN ReadUncompRGBImage( HIMAGE hImage, HWFILE hFile, UINT8 uiImgID, UINT8 uiColMap, UINT16 fContents )
00148 {
00149       UINT8       *pBMData;
00150       UINT8       *pBMPtr;
00151 
00152       UINT16      uiColMapOrigin;
00153       UINT16      uiColMapLength;
00154       UINT8       uiColMapEntrySize;
00155       UINT32      uiBytesRead;
00156       UINT16      uiXOrg;
00157       UINT16      uiYOrg;
00158       UINT16      uiWidth;
00159       UINT16      uiHeight;
00160       UINT8       uiImagePixelSize;
00161       UINT8       uiImageDescriptor;
00162       UINT32      iNumValues;
00163       UINT16  cnt;
00164 
00165       UINT32      i;
00166       UINT8       r;
00167       UINT8       g;
00168       UINT8       b;
00169 
00170       if ( !FileRead( hFile, &uiColMapOrigin, sizeof(UINT16), &uiBytesRead ) )
00171             goto end;
00172       if ( !FileRead( hFile, &uiColMapLength, sizeof(UINT16), &uiBytesRead ) )
00173             goto end;
00174       if ( !FileRead( hFile, &uiColMapEntrySize, sizeof(UINT8), &uiBytesRead ) )
00175             goto end;
00176 
00177       if ( !FileRead( hFile, &uiXOrg, sizeof(UINT16), &uiBytesRead ) )
00178             goto end;
00179       if ( !FileRead( hFile, &uiYOrg, sizeof(UINT16), &uiBytesRead ) )
00180             goto end;
00181       if ( !FileRead( hFile, &uiWidth, sizeof(UINT16), &uiBytesRead ) )
00182             goto end;
00183       if ( !FileRead( hFile, &uiHeight, sizeof(UINT16), &uiBytesRead ) )
00184             goto end;
00185       if ( !FileRead( hFile, &uiImagePixelSize, sizeof(UINT8), &uiBytesRead ) )
00186             goto end;
00187       if ( !FileRead( hFile, &uiImageDescriptor, sizeof(UINT8), &uiBytesRead ) )
00188             goto end;
00189 
00190       // skip the id
00191       FileSeek( hFile, uiImgID, FILE_SEEK_FROM_CURRENT );
00192 
00193       // skip the colour map
00194       if ( uiColMap != 0 )
00195       {
00196             FileSeek( hFile, uiColMapLength * (uiImagePixelSize / 8), FILE_SEEK_FROM_CURRENT );
00197       }
00198 
00199       // Set some HIMAGE data values
00200       hImage->usWidth = uiWidth;
00201       hImage->usHeight = uiHeight;
00202       hImage->ubBitDepth = uiImagePixelSize;
00203 
00204       // Allocate memory based on bpp, height, width
00205 
00206       // Only do if contents flag is appropriate
00207       if ( fContents & IMAGE_BITMAPDATA )
00208       {
00209 
00210             if ( uiImagePixelSize == 16 )
00211             {
00212 
00213                   iNumValues = uiWidth * uiHeight;
00214 
00215                   hImage->p16BPPData = (UINT16 *) MemAlloc( iNumValues * (uiImagePixelSize / 8) );
00216 
00217                   if ( hImage->p16BPPData == NULL )
00218                         goto end;
00219 
00220                   // Get data pointer
00221                   pBMData = hImage->p8BPPData;
00222 
00223                   // Start at end
00224                   pBMData += uiWidth * ( uiHeight - 1 ) * (uiImagePixelSize / 8);
00225 
00226                   // Data is stored top-bottom - reverse for SGP HIMAGE format
00227                   for ( cnt = 0; cnt < uiHeight-1; cnt++ )
00228                   {
00229                         if ( !FileRead( hFile, pBMData, uiWidth*2, &uiBytesRead ) )
00230                               goto freeEnd;
00231 
00232                         pBMData -= uiWidth * 2;
00233                   }
00234                   // Do first row
00235                   if ( !FileRead( hFile, pBMData, uiWidth*2, &uiBytesRead ) )
00236                               goto freeEnd;
00237 
00238                   // Convert TGA 5,5,5 16 BPP data into current system 16 BPP Data
00239                   //ConvertTGAToSystemBPPFormat( hImage );
00240 
00241                   hImage->fFlags |= IMAGE_BITMAPDATA;
00242 
00243 
00244             }
00245 
00246             if ( uiImagePixelSize == 24 )
00247             {
00248                   hImage->p8BPPData = (UINT8 *) MemAlloc( uiWidth * uiHeight * (uiImagePixelSize / 8) );
00249 
00250                   if ( hImage->p8BPPData == NULL )
00251                         goto end;
00252 
00253                   // Get data pointer
00254                   pBMData = (UINT8*)hImage->p8BPPData;
00255 
00256                   // Start at end
00257                   pBMPtr = pBMData + uiWidth * ( uiHeight - 1 ) * 3;
00258 
00259                   iNumValues = uiWidth * uiHeight;
00260 
00261                   for ( cnt = 0; cnt < uiHeight; cnt++ )
00262                   {
00263                         for ( i=0 ; i < uiWidth; i++ )
00264                         {
00265                               if ( !FileRead( hFile, &b, sizeof(UINT8), &uiBytesRead ) )
00266                                     goto freeEnd;
00267                               if ( !FileRead( hFile, &g, sizeof(UINT8), &uiBytesRead ) )
00268                                     goto freeEnd;
00269                               if ( !FileRead( hFile, &r, sizeof(UINT8), &uiBytesRead ) )
00270                                     goto freeEnd;
00271 
00272                               pBMPtr[ i*3   ] = r;
00273                               pBMPtr[ i*3+1 ] = g;
00274                               pBMPtr[ i*3+2 ] = b;
00275                         }
00276                         pBMPtr -= uiWidth * 3;
00277                   }
00278                   hImage->fFlags |= IMAGE_BITMAPDATA;
00279             }
00280 
00281             #if 0
00282             // 32 bit not yet allowed in SGP
00283             else if ( uiImagePixelSize == 32 )
00284             {
00285                   iNumValues = uiWidth * uiHeight;
00286 
00287                   for ( i=0 ; i<iNumValues; i++ )
00288                   {
00289                         if ( !FileRead( hFile, &b, sizeof(UINT8), &uiBytesRead ) )
00290                               goto freeEnd;
00291                         if ( !FileRead( hFile, &g, sizeof(UINT8), &uiBytesRead ) )
00292                               goto freeEnd;
00293                         if ( !FileRead( hFile, &r, sizeof(UINT8), &uiBytesRead ) )
00294                               goto freeEnd;
00295                         if ( !FileRead( hFile, &a, sizeof(UINT8), &uiBytesRead ) )
00296                               goto freeEnd;
00297 
00298                         pBMData[ i*3   ] = r;
00299                         pBMData[ i*3+1 ] = g;
00300                         pBMData[ i*3+2 ] = b;
00301                   }
00302             }
00303             #endif
00304 
00305       }
00306       return( TRUE );
00307 
00308 end:
00309       return( FALSE );
00310 
00311 freeEnd:
00312       MemFree( pBMData );
00313       return( FALSE );
00314 }
00315

00354 /*
00355 BOOLEAN     ConvertTGAToSystemBPPFormat( HIMAGE hImage )
00356 {
00357       UINT16            usX, usY;
00358       UINT16            Old16BPPValue;
00359       UINT16            *pData;
00360       UINT16            usR, usG, usB;
00361       float             scale_val;
00362       UINT32            uiRBitMask;
00363       UINT32            uiGBitMask;
00364       UINT32            uiBBitMask;
00365       UINT8             ubRNewShift;
00366       UINT8             ubGNewShift;
00367       UINT8             ubBNewShift;
00368       UINT8             ubScaleR;
00369       UINT8             ubScaleB;
00370       UINT8             ubScaleG;
00371 
00372       // Basic algorithm for coonverting to different rgb distributions
00373 
00374       // Get current Pixel Format from DirectDraw
00375       CHECKF( GetPrimaryRGBDistributionMasks( &uiRBitMask, &uiGBitMask, &uiBBitMask ) );
00376 
00377       // Only convert if different
00378       if ( uiRBitMask == 0x7c00 && uiGBitMask == 0x3e0 && uiBBitMask == 0x1f )
00379       {
00380             return( TRUE );
00381       }
00382 
00383       // Default values
00384       ubScaleR                = 0;
00385       ubScaleG                = 0;
00386       ubScaleB                = 0;
00387       ubRNewShift   = 10;
00388       ubGNewShift   = 5;
00389       ubBNewShift   = 0;
00390 
00391       // Determine values
00392   switch( uiBBitMask )
00393   {
00394             case 0x3f: // 0000000000111111 pixel mask for blue
00395 
00396                   // 5-5-6
00397                   ubRNewShift = 11;
00398                   ubGNewShift = 6;
00399                   ubScaleB          = 1;
00400                   break;
00401 
00402     case 0x1f: // 0000000000011111 pixel mask for blue
00403                   switch( uiGBitMask )
00404       {
00405                         case 0x7e0: // 0000011111100000 pixel mask for green
00406 
00407               // 5-6-5
00408                               ubRNewShift = 11;
00409                               ubScaleG    = 1;
00410                               break;
00411 
00412         case 0x3e0: // 0000001111100000 pixel mask for green
00413 
00414                               switch( uiRBitMask )
00415           {
00416                                     case 0xfc00: // 1111110000000000 pixel mask for red
00417 
00418                                           // 6-5-5
00419                                           ubScaleR    = 1;
00420                                           break;
00421           }
00422           break;
00423       }
00424       break;
00425   }
00426 
00427       pData = hImage->pui16BPPPalette;
00428       usX = 0;
00429       do
00430       {
00431 
00432             usY = 0;
00433 
00434             do
00435             {
00436 
00437                   // Get Old 5,5,5 value
00438                   Old16BPPValue = hImage->p16BPPData[ usX * hImage->usWidth + usY ];
00439 
00440                   // Get component r,g,b values AT 5 5 5
00441                   usR = ( Old16BPPValue & 0x7c00 ) >> 10;
00442                   usG = ( Old16BPPValue & 0x3e0 ) >> 5;
00443                   usB = Old16BPPValue & 0x1f;
00444 
00445                   // Scale accordingly
00446                   usR = usR << ubScaleR;
00447                   usG = usG << ubScaleG;
00448                   usB = usB << ubScaleB;
00449 
00450                   hImage->p16BPPData[ usX * hImage->usWidth + usY ] = ((UINT16) ( ( usR << ubRNewShift | usG << ubGNewShift ) | usB  ) );
00451 
00452                   usY++;
00453 
00454             } while( usY < hImage->usWidth );
00455 
00456             usX++;
00457 
00458       } while( usX < hImage->usHeight );
00459 
00460       return( TRUE );
00461 
00462 }
00463 */
